title: GitHub Copilot Official Repository
body:
Official GitHub Copilot documentation repository: https://github.com/github/copilot-docs

This is the official documentation repository for GitHub Copilot containing public documentation, examples, guides, and best practices. The core Copilot engine is proprietary, but this repo provides comprehensive usage documentation and integration examples.
semanticSummary: Official GitHub Copilot documentation repository: https://github.com/github/copilot-docs
